data.title: About Bill Johnson & Bluejay Productions
data.meta_description: I am a music composer for film and TV, commercials, whatever. I have worked on many different kinds of projects, most recently the logo for Lionsgate Films for my buddy John Berlin at Devastudios. Previously I had done the logo for Tristar Pictures. Much of MTV's early music was recorded by me and my band…
data.text:
I am a music composer for film and TV, commercials, whatever.

I have worked on many different kinds of projects, most recently the logo for Lionsgate Films for my buddy John Berlin at Devastudios. Previously I had done the logo for Tristar Pictures.

Much of MTV’s early music was recorded by me and my band JZ. Also do movie trailers and a few commercials. On TV I did a series on Nickelodeon called “The Mystery Files of Shelby Woo”. Just finished the short film “Spaceboy” for my friend the director Randy Riggs.

I also write songs and other instrumental music for myself.

Here’s a pic of me rocking out on the guitar at the Roxy.

Share this:

About Bill Johnson & Bluejay Productions

I am a music composer for film and TV, commercials, whatever.

I have worked on many different kinds of projects, most recently the logo for Lionsgate Films for my buddy John Berlin at Devastudios. Previously I had done the logo for Tristar Pictures.

Much of MTV’s early music was recorded by me and my band JZ. Also do movie trailers and a few commercials. On TV I did a series on Nickelodeon called “The Mystery Files of Shelby Woo”. Just finished the short film “Spaceboy” for my friend the director Randy Riggs.

I also write songs and other instrumental music for myself.

Here’s a pic of me rocking out on the guitar at the Roxy.
